## Overview

This is a test guideline for Impella mechanical circulatory support (MCS) device.

## Indication

Brief description of when Impella MCS device is indicated.

## Contraindications

List of contraindications for Impella placement.

## Procedure

Step-by-step procedure for Impella insertion and management.

### Pre-Procedure Checklist {#pre-impella}

::: {.checklist id="pre-impella-checklist" title="Pre-Impella Checklist"}
- [ ] Verify patient identity and consent
- [ ] Review medical history and allergies
- [ ] Confirm vascular access site
- [ ] Ensure Impella device is available and functional
- [ ] Complete pre-procedure timeout
- [ ] Verify emergency protocols are in place
:::

### Procedure Steps

1. **Preparation**
   - Follow standard precautions
   - Position patient appropriately
   - Prepare sterile field

2. **Impella Insertion**
   - Perform according to protocol
   - Monitor hemodynamics continuously
   - Document all steps

3. **Completion**
   - Ensure proper positioning
   - Secure device appropriately
   - Move patient to ICU

### Post-Procedure Checklist {#post-impella}

::: {.checklist id="post-impella-checklist" title="Post-Impella Checklist"}
- [ ] Monitor hemodynamics stable
- [ ] Assess vascular access site
- [ ] Document procedure details
- [ ] ICU monitoring initiated
- [ ] Device settings optimized
- [ ] Follow-up imaging scheduled
:::

## Monitoring

What to monitor during Impella support.

### Impella Monitoring Checklist {#impella-monitoring}

::: {.checklist id="impella-monitoring-checklist" title="Impella Monitoring"}
- [ ] Pump flow adequate
- [ ] Pressure waveforms normal
- [ ] No signs of hemolysis
- [ ] Vascular access intact
- [ ] Anticoagulation appropriate
- [ ] Device alarms addressed
- [ ] Patient hemodynamically stable
:::
